extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed version of Veeam Backup & Replication.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which version of Veeam Backup & Replication is installed?

extracted_playbook.title: Confirm System is Not Vulnerable
extracted_playbook.description: The system is not vulnerable if running Veeam Backup & Replication 11a or 10a with the specified builds or later.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Veeam Backup & Replication 9.5
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to a supported version of Veeam Backup & Replication as there is no patch available for version 9.5.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patch for Veeam Backup & Replication 10 or 11
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the available patches for Veeam Backup & Replication 10 or 11 to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Veeam Distribution Service
extracted_playbook.description: As a temporary mitigation, stop and disable the Veeam Distribution Service on the Veeam Backup & Replication server and distribution servers in Protection Groups.
